𒅆 ŠI < 𒋾 TI 𓋹 𓈖 𓐍

𒋾 TIʳ 𐠯 ti ≈ 󲀕 󲀖 󲀗 tîr 𓌕 •arrow 𐘠 TI 𔖪 za 𔖩 zi 𐘎 ZO 𐀿 zo 𐀵 to 𐘄 TO taur

𓋹 •Zink >
𓋹 կյանք kyankʿ kjankʰ "life" >
𓋹 ≈ 𐊶 carian letter TT₂ •Tկյank
𓋹 ⲱⲛϧ ˢōnx ⲱⲛϩ ˢōnḫ sank™ ⲱ ⇔ 𓍲 𓈖 𓏌 𓍶 ⋍ 𓈙 𓈖 𓍶

𒋾 ≈ 𒁁𒁹𒌋 ≈ 𒀸𒁹𒌋
𒋾 𒆰 𒁄 𒍘
𒋾 •S'TI 𓊨 sit
𒋾 TI 𒋿 tibnu "tipping"
𒋾 TI 𓌕 𐠯 ti 𔖪 za 𔖩 zi 𐘠 TIᵖ
𒋾 TI ♀ ⋍ 𒋾 Thian : Tin, Theon, Zoon (Shanti = Live)
𒋾 TI tawi- tāwīs 2eye dual@Luwian "eye"
𒋾 TI ≈ 𓊃 tzwie in 𓊃 𓈙 𓂋 𓌕 ≈ 𒋾 TI [𓋹]] Tink/Zink
𒋾 TIʳ 𓌕 til₃ tîr 𒉼 تیر tir তীর tīr ᵗarrow 𒋾𒌓𒋾𒌝 tiutium 𓊃𓈙𓂋𓌕 shooter 𓄝 ζoo.tîr GeTier Teiler 𓌕?
𒋾 TIʳ ≈ turn in 𒋾𒁄 to turn sideways ( 𒁄 bala ≈ ফাল phal )
𒋾 /bih/ vita < biota 𒁁 BÀD > bu TI 𒋾 (𒂗𒋾𒅋 Ebih-Il e-bih-il EN-TI-IL)
𒋾 til₃ til3 = 𒁁 in some scripts
𒋾 til₃ •twilʿ 𐎕𐎍𐎓 ṣilʿ 𒍜𒋾 ḍilʕ ضِلْع < צלע zila "rib" ⇔ 𐎕 Teil zooᵃˡ
𒋾 til₃ "dwell" @ Stuhl
𒋾 ≈ 𒌀 til total complete

𒋾 TIʳ 𓌕 tîr ⇔ 𓂧 𓂋 𓄛 Tier via 𓄝 𒋾𒊏 ti'rah₂

𒋾 TIʳ 𓌕 tîr ⇔ 𒌁 tir "bow" bieg @ 𐌱𐌰𐌲𐌼𐍃 tir @ tree
𒋾 teĝ₄ τόξο tóxo “bow” 𓐮 τόξον toxon "arc" 𓂚 τοξότης toxótēs “archer” troops 𓂚 𓅱 𓌕 "arrow, weapons" 𒉼

𒋾 taxus (yew, javelin 𓌕 ) تخش taxš “crossbow”

𒋾 taxon τάξις táxis "order" ⇔

𒋾 TIˣ 𒋼 teĝ₃ 𒋼𒄷 ṭe-ḫuⁿ 𓏏 𓎡 𓈖 𓂻 tĕka ᵈyakın "near, adjacent"

𒋾 TIˣ 𒆗 тыхджын tyxǵyn strong

𒋾𒆷 ti-la tila теля́ teljá теле teľa teļš "calf" vitulus m, vitula f, vitellus m, vitella f < taur !

nᵍ conpoment

𒋾 teĝ₄ ≈ 𓐮 τόξον tóxon “bow” vs arrow
𒋾 teĝ₄ teng ⇔ 𓋹 𓈖 𓎡
𒋾 teĝ₄ 𒋼 teĝ₃ 𒋼𒄷 ṭe-ḫu #ţehûⁿ 𓏏 𓎡 𓈖 𓂻 tĕkaⁿ ᵈyakın "near, adjacent"

𒆗 dan 𐀪 don djin jini 정신 jeongsin "spirit"
𒆗 dan 𐀪 don djin تىن tin тын tïn theon 天 tiān "spirit"
𒆗 dan 𐀪 don djin tï̄n 𒋾 tınç tînc 𓋹 𓈖 𓐍 dinc dȳnç Ding "spirit, breath, life"

old rebus cluster

𒋾 til₃ al.til₃ alt old permuted
𒋾 til₃ tîr 𒉼 tir তীর tīr տարեց ⇔ tarecʿ stàr starr "old"
𒋾 arrow ⇔ አሮጌ ʾäroge "old"

𒋾 Pfeil βέλος bélos “arrow” ⇔ paleoˢ "old" 𒁁 "bad" ≈ 𒋾
𒁄 bala ≈ ফাল phal πλευρό plevró in 𒋾𒁄 TIʳbala turn sideways ⇔ plow plough < фарс < persiat?
𒍜𒋾 πλευρό plevró rib πλευρόν pleurónᵏ flank, side of a torso ^^

𒋾 TI life > 𐎪𐎡𐎺𐎫𐎡𐎹 ji-i-v-t-i-y /jīvatiy/ live

𓌕 ⋍ 𒁁 ⋍ 𒍗 ⋍ 𒌀 ⋍ 𒋾 TIL til₃ (Alternative forms)
𓉻 dart, dort, door ( 𒋾 Tür : there )

𒋾 TI ⋍ 𒅆 SI see (after it)
𒋾 TI to do 𓁹 𒁕𒀀𒌋𒄿𒅖 /dāuīs/ "eye" videoˢ :
𒀀𒋾 /ati/ aja- make@Luwian 𓁹 •eye [Hittite aia-]

𒄷 ≈ 𒀸𒁹𒌋𒁹 ≈ 𒋾 ≈ ḪU in חיא ħayē ህይወት həywät … "life"
𒉅 ≈ 𒄷𒎕 ≈ 𒀸𒁹𒌋𒁹𒎕 ≈ 𒀸𒁹𒌋𒁹𒑊𒑖 ≠ 𒀅 𒅅 ≈ 𒀸𒁹𒌋𒁹𒑊 ≈ 𒄷𒀸𒑱 ḪUʳ/ḪUᵍ
𒉆 𒋾 nam-til₃ /namtil/ life < 𒋾 til₃, “to live” ⇔ nehmen = take
𒍣 napištu "life" nephish hayam

𓋹 կյանք kyankʿ

𓋹 Tink 𒋾 TI 𒋫𒀝𒈨;𒁕𒀝𒆠𒈨;𒋫𒀝𒆠𒈨 ta-ak-me; da-ak-ki-me; ta-ak-ki-me :
𓋹 Tink 𒋾 TI 𒋫𒀝𒈨; tākime < taken: duk 𒂁 ;𒁺;𒁺𒄴;𒁺𒅖; "conceive(d)"
𓋹 Tink 𒋾 TI ⇔ tango, tener vs DON

𓌕 = 𒋾 TI 𒈧 تیر তীর tīr ⋍ 𓄝 ⋍ 𓄜 ⋍ Tier < Tiger ⋍ 𐭲𐭢𐭫 tigr = 𓌕

𒋾 tackle, attack
𒋾 towards, meet
𒋾 timid (alternating class, hamtu stem; see te-ĝe26)

𒋾 adjectives suffix marker -ty ⇔ 𒌅 tu
𒃲𒋾 GAL-ti great(ness) (ti: you are)
𒊌𒆪𒇻𒋾 uk-ku-lu-ti okkult very dark ⇔ kala=black
𒄭𒄗𒋾 ḫisuhti gesucht / high-society "desirable" 𒄭 ḫi / gal ≈ high 𒃲 GAL
𒂊𒆪𒈾𒀸 e-ku-na-aš icy-cool

𒋾 noun suffix marker -ty tion :
𒀭𒋾 DINGIR-ti divinity
𒃲𒋾 GAL-ti great(ness)
𒆠𒁉𒋾 Gebieta Gebot/command = 𒆠𒂍𒆠 qí-bit-ki
𒈠𒋾 mati of the land

𒋾 noun marker TER 𓏛 ⇔ 𒋻 tar 𒋫 𒋫 :
𒁶𒋾 •crym'tir : tear 🌢𓆊𓁿

  1. 𒂊 𒉿 𒆳 𒀀 𒉣 𒋾 𒃻 𒆠 𒆳 𒌅𒄣𒌦𒋾
  2. e-pi-šat a-nun-ti šá-ki-nat tu-qu-un-ti
  3. The one who makes (a) fight, arranges battle

𒈦 MAŠ mas much more vs

Dvian > Diana ♀♀ Devus (godly twins 單) > Janus & Venus 双𓌢 > वनस् vánas, “loveliness, desire” Wunsch …

Kurden 𓃶 Guti 𒄖𒋾 @ 𒄖𒌅𒌝𒆠 Gutium𒆳

In sumerian the similar-sounding words "life" [til] and "arrow" [ti] were written with the same symbol 𒋾 ⋍ 𓋹 @ Horus 𓂚

𓌕 = 𒋾 TI ⋍𒈧 تیر তীর tīr ⋍ 𓄝 ⋍ 𓄜 ⋍ Tier < Tiger ⋍ 𐭲𐭢𐭫 tigr = 𓌕
तीर tīr тир Türken ⋍= Kasachen ⋍ qarsoq = sagetar ☑

𒋾 suffix ty ⋍ heit :

𒅅𒇷𒋾 (dun)ek-le-ti dunkelheit 𓎡 𓎡 𓇰 darkness

𒋾𒇷 ti-li tell in 𒅗𒊑𒋾𒇷 ka-re ti-li grain tell 𓏏 a grain-heap
